scripts.update: tsc && claudia update --no-optional-dependencies --api-module bin/index --region us-east-1 --policies policies/*.json
scripts.create: tsc && claudia create --no-optional-dependencies --api-module bin/index --region us-east-1 --policies policies/*.json --timeout 300 --memory 4096 --layers arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:606735259578:layer:canvas-nodejs:1
